issue.title: [R] Reorganise the datetime bindings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16255](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16255). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently there is a bit of mish-mash. Most bindings are defined in `R/dplyr-funcs-datetime.R`, while sole are in `R/dplyr-funcs-type.R`. We have also set a cyclomatic complexity threshold of 26 so this should be an opportunity to reduce it more towards the default of 15.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16255?focusedCommentId=17531732) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13029
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13029>
